newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Tuan Sing touches new high on results.
newsitem.headline: Tuan Sing touches new high on results.

text.p: Property and construction group Tuan Sing Holdings Ltd touched a new year high of Singapore $0.685 in early trading on Tuesday after releasing a strong set of results, said dealers.
After about 10 minutes of trading, the shares were at S$0.675, up 2.5 cents, with over 1.6 million units changing hands.

The company had announced a 140 percent rise in net profit to S$38.6 million for 1996 on Monday, much higher than analysts' expectations. The Estimate Directory had an analyst concensus forecast of S$22.8 million for the year.
Chief executive officer Hwang Soo Chin said the company planned to step up its regionalisation plans.
